title: Bug: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer, an issue occurs.
OB: Currently, there is no synchronization mechanism available for synchronizing a .java file and another resource in the package viewer. Attempting to perform this action does not produce any visible result.
EB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource in the package viewer, both files should be synchronized successfully and any changes made to either file should be reflected in the other file.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer. 2. Attempt to synchronize the selected files and observe that no synchronization occurs.
